Submitter Information: PerkinElmer Life and Analytical Sciences Wallac Oy
Specimen Type(s): Blood specimens dried on filter paper
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AutoDELFIA Neonatal 17 α-OH-progesterone L kit for quantitative determination of 17 α-OH-progesterone using fluoroimmunoassay
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of 17 α-OH-progesterone in blood specimens dried on filter paper to aid in screening newborns for congenital adrenal hyperplasia (CAH) using the 1235 AutoDELFIA automatic immunoassay system
